verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> to it, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> O <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, and I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you most <S%H8077>desolate.<s%>
I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste,<s%> and you shall be <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> you have <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H342>hatred,<s%> and have <S%H5064>shed<s%> the blood of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H3027>force<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity,<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> had an <S%H7093>end:<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> you to <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you: <S%H518>since<s%> you have not <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> even <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you.

Thus will I <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H8077>most<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from it him that <S%H5674>passes<s%> out and him that <S%H7725>returns.<s%>

And I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H2022>mountains<s%> with his <S%H2491>slain<s%> men: in your <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and in your <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H650>rivers,<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolations,<s%> and your <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall not <S%H3427>return:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> you have <S%H559>said,<s%> These <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%> shall be mine, and we will <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; whereas the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H8033>there:<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> I will even <S%H6213>do<s%> according to your <S%H639>anger,<s%> and according to your <S%H7068>envy<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>used<s%> out of your <S%H8135>hatred<s%> against them; and I will make myself <S%H3045>known<s%> among them, <S%H834>when<s%> I have <S%H8199>judged<s%> you.

And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and that I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5007>blasphemies<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> They are laid <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> they are <S%H5414>given<s%> us to <S%H402>consume.<s%>

Thus with your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> you have <S%H1431>boasted<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and have <S%H6280>multiplied<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me: I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.
<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> When the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices,<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H8077>desolate.<s%>

As you did <S%H8057>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> it was <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to you: you shall be <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> O <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H123>Idumea,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> of it: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
